extensionDescription.message: Allows to select the courses in hyperplanning.

action1.message: You should be able to select some texte with your mouse \n and do a right click everywhere.

action2.message: You should be able to select some texte with your mouse \n and do a right click everywhere.

action3.message: You can now do a Ctrl+a to select everything. \n Better paste it as raw text (as value) in Excel.
